constraint.name: ca_serviciosat_agentes
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (codagente) REFERENCES agentes (codagente) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_serviciosat_almacenes
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (codalmacen) REFERENCES almacenes (codaLmacen) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_serviciosat_clientes
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (codcliente) REFERENCES clientes (codcliente) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_serviciosat_maquinas
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idmaquina) REFERENCES serviciosat_maquinas (idmaquina) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_serviciosat_maquinas2
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idmaquina2) REFERENCES serviciosat_maquinas (idmaquina) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_serviciosat_maquinas3
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idmaquina3) REFERENCES serviciosat_maquinas (idmaquina) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_serviciosat_maquinas4
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idmaquina4) REFERENCES serviciosat_maquinas (idmaquina) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_serviciosat_empresas
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idempresa) REFERENCES empresas (idempresa) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_serviciosat_estados
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idestado) REFERENCES serviciosat_estados (id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_serviciosat_users
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (nick) REFERENCES users (nick) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_serviciosat_asignado
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (asignado) REFERENCES users (nick) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_serviciosat_idprioridad
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idprioridad) REFERENCES serviciosat_prioridades (id) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_serviciosat_idtipo
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idtipo) REFERENCES serviciosat_tipos (id) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE
